definitions.usage_example: He didn't show up for work today.
definitions.alternative_example: He didn't arrive at work today.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él no apareció (no vino) a trabajar hoy.

definitions.usage_example: You showed me up in front of my boss!
definitions.alternative_example: You embarrassed me in front of my boss!
definitions.usage_example_es: ¡Me hiciste quedar mal (me humillaste) frente a mi jefe!

definitions.usage_example: He's just showing off his new car.
definitions.alternative_example: He's just boasting about his new car.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él solo está presumiendo su auto nuevo.

definitions.usage_example: Let me show you around the new office.
definitions.alternative_example: Let me give you a tour of the new office.
definitions.usage_example_es: Déjame mostrarte la nueva oficina (hacerte un tour).
